review.title: “Disneyland for Adults”
review.pros: Pros – buzzing with tourists, great cheeses and breads, and wine
review.cons: Cons – buzzing with tourists, pay is low hourly plus commission that you do not get to acrue until after you've reached a certain amount per day!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – pay more salary, and commission -share more of the wine pie!
